Submit - l. 16: (|á¼‘ÎºÎ¬ÏƒÏ„Ï‰Î¹|) <#Î³=3#> -> á¼‘ÎºÎ¬ÏƒÏ„Ï‰Î¹ (á¼€ÏÏ„(Î¬Î²Î±Î¹)) <#Î³=3#> The word á¼‘ÎºÎ¬ÏƒÏ„Ï‰Î¹ is written in full and it is clear on the photo online. Î¤here is also a clear abbreviated form of the word á¼€ÏÏ„Î¬Î²Î·, which should be resolved in the nominatÎ¹ve plural. Then instead of the edition's [.4] -> (á¼€[ÏÏ„(Î¬Î²Î±Î¹])) [Î¹Îµ] (á¼€Ì£Î½Ì£(á½°)) ((Î´ÏÎ±Ï‡Î¼á½°Ï‚))<#Î¹=10#>. This works perfectly fine, because there are 5 calves (see on l. 6) x 3 art./ calf = 15 x 10 dr/art. - 150 drachmas, which appears as the total at the end of the line. In addition, in ll. 13 and 17 instead of the nominative Î´ÏÎ±Ï‡Î¼Î±Î¯ it shouÎ»d,be resolved in the accusative; see LSJ s.v. á¼€Î½Î¬ C III.

Then instead of the edition's [.4] -> (á¼€[ÏÏ„(Î¬Î²Î±Î¹])) [Î¹Îµ] (á¼€Ì£Î½Ì£(á½°)) ((Î´ÏÎ±Ï‡Î¼á½°Ï‚))<#Î¹=10#>. This works perfectly fine, because there are 5 calves (see on l. 6) x 3 art./ calf = 15 x 10 dr/art. - 150 drachmas, which appears as the total at the end of the line. In addition, in ll. 13 and 17 instead of the nominative Î´ÏÎ±Ï‡Î¼Î±Î¯ it shouÎ»d,be resolved in the accusative; see LSJ s.v. á¼€Î½Î¬ C III.

Then instead of the edition's [.4] -> (á¼€[ÏÏ„(Î¬Î²Î±Î¹])) [Î¹Îµ] (á¼€Ì£Î½Ì£(á½°)) (Î´ÏÎ±Ï‡Î¼á½°Ï‚) <#Î¹=10#>. In addition, in ll. 13 and 17 instead of the nominative Î´ÏÎ±Ï‡Î¼Î±Î¯ it shouÎ»d,be resolved in the accusative; see LSJ s.v. á¼€Î½Î¬ C III.
